history.text: I like the message of inclusivity this sends to kids, it looks like it gets great reviews, and would be fun to watch!
I agree with you on the fact that it has a great message on inclusivity. I also think that there is a ​message about not always believing stereotypes.

I also love the characters and actors they've assigned to do the voices.  A diminutive sheep as assistant mayor, an eager rabbit, an african water buffalo as chief of police.  And, a fox as the con artist.  Sounds entertaining and interesting
